item.description:
Sorry about the short notice. The West Boylston Cinema has $3 Tuesdays, and everyone I know says Horrible Bosses is really funny.

Jason Bateman, Charlie Day, and Jason Sudeikis decide their lives would be much better if their horrible bosses (Kevin Spacey, Jennifer Aniston, and Colin Farrell) were no more. They get murder advice from a professional (Jamie Foxx), but it doesn't quite go according to plan.

The movie is at 7:15. Let's plan to meet in the lobby of the West Boylston Cinema at 6:45. We can have a quick bite to eat at O'Connor's Pub after the movie. If you need to reach me, feel free to call my cell phone at 508-981-0455.

- David
item.how_to_find_us: We'll meet in the lobby. I look like my photo, but with a goatee.

group.name: The Worcester Movie Fans Meetup Group

item.name: Horrible Bosses
